entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Peter's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 11:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 8.6°C
Wind: S 39 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 early this evening. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Amount 15 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
